title: SJB to take disciplinary action against Harin, Manusha
body_lines: Disciplinary action would be taken against SJB MPs who were sworn in as Ministers, Chief Opposition Whip Lakshman Kiriella said today.
He told Parliament that the SJB had decided to support the government in constructive proposals without taking up ministerial positions.
However, SJB MPs Harin Fernando and Manusha Nanayakkara were sworn in as Ministers this morning.(Ajith Siriwardana and Yohan Perera)
